body.name: Merries Unisex Baby Diapers, 90 Count, Ultra-Soft, Breathable, and Chemical-Free
body.stockDetail: Only 4 left in stock - order soon.
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 14 hrs 24 mins
FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21. Order within 14 hrs 24 mins
features: Exceptional quality: only top-quality materials are used for the production of Japanese diapers. Therefore, the cases of diaper rash or dermatitis are especially rare even through the baby's skin is sensitive. An exceptional feature of Japanese diapers – they have no "chemical" odor which becomes especially pungent when diapers are full!

Closer to nature: Merries diapers are manufactured using only ecologically clean and safe materials which do not contain formaldehyde, phthalates or petroleum-based products! Merries tapes do not contain lotions, fragrances or synthetic aromas!

Reduce stuffiness - one factor of skin irritation: the fabric includes a 3-layer air-through system. The 1st layer is a soft airy surface, an airy wavy mesh enhances breathability, allowing air to pass through to the 2nd absorbent layer, and then air passes to the 3rd all around breathable sheet layer. Breathability that removes moisture and stuffiness is so important!

Ultra-soft, fluffy and breathing: air soft surface contains 2 convex shapes: large and small. Large convex shape allows quickly absorb pee and poo, while small convex shape is intended for preventing spreading of poo around diaper. Both side parts are made of multiple fine waves(=convex-concave)! The wavy surface reduces the skin contact area so that it does not stick to baby's skin! Newly mounted on center part's volume-absorbent zone!

Soft reusable magic seal and color-changing wetness indicators: the green seal is easy to spot even during night changes. The corners are rounded and made of a soft material that is gentle and does not scratch the baby's skin. When the strips change color to dark blue, it is time to change the diaper! There's no design around the strips, making it easy to see when the color changes. Merries diapers come in a bundle with Americas Toys branded wipes.
body.description: INSPIRED "Merries" comes from the English word "merry", which means cheerful and smiley. It is also inspired from the musical merry-go-round mobile hung above babies' cribs to make them smile 24 hours a day, 365 days a year. Merries wants babies to be happy, comfortable, and smiling. We believe that the happy times which happy babies and happy parents spend together are vital to the baby's growth and development. Merries will constantly innovate to help parents enjoy their child-raising years and ensure that their babies live as happily and comfortably as possible.FEATURES:NEW TECHNOLOGY! Newly mounted on center part's volume-absorbent zone!Super absorbent, highly breathable and ultra-soft so your active baby stays dry and comfortable! Instantly draws in and locks away pee, leaving the diaper surface drier for longer usage!The polymers in Merries diapers can absorb up to 200 - 300 times the weight of fluid relative to its weight. You can have a peace of mind even on mornings when your baby has peed a lot overnight! The wavy surface traps and holds poo! The recessed areas of the soft sheet effectively trap the soft poo and prevent it from dispersing. Block leakage with double gathers! 3D side gather prevents side leakage. Back gathers for a snug fit helps avoid leakage for S, M, L, XL sizes. . When the strips change color to dark blue, it is time to change the diaper! There's no design around the strips, making it easy to see when the color changes. The corners are rounded and made of a soft material that is gentle and does not scratch the baby's skin. And the reusable seal is so convenient!.Gathers around the legs. Fits perfectly around baby's legs!Fit snugly in all positions, stretch gently around your baby's waist.No red marks or abrasions at the crotch area!

reviews.reviewText: It’s great diaper that I have ever used for my baby. I think it’s soft so he feel comfortable. Doesn’t leave the line show on baby skin. Doesn’t feel humidity. Great absorb. Light. The lady who has the baby same babysitter with me, she stole these diapers from us…

reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Baby doesn’t have blowouts with these diapers and they are super soft and feel natural against our baby’s skin. Our boy had no rashes since using these diapers! Highly recommend!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars May or may not be the best for little boys
reviews.reviewText: A family friend highly recommended I try these diapers for my son claiming that they are very soft and extremely absorbent allowing babies to sleep well through the night without waking for a diaper change. I tried these diapers a few times and found the opposite. There were many leaks both from the side and the back.The diapers are indeed very soft and pleasant to the touch. However, I think it depends on how wet the diaper becomes over the course of hours. My little boy has a very strong stream and can sometimes have very heavy wet diapers even after 2-3 hours. I found that Merries just didn't absorb that well compared to other brands.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 15, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars the best BREATHABLE diapers
reviews.reviewText: These are the best BREATHABLE diapers. None of the diapers sold in the US are breathable.
